pages.text: In the info screen chapter, you learned that you can assign modes to your cat. They will be discussed in further detail here.

pages.title: Docile
pages.text: In this mode your cat will follow you but not attack anything. But you can always toss some toys around.

pages.title: Wandering
pages.text: In this mode, your cat will wander the world freely.$(br2)You may want to put a radio collar on your cat first.... Jus' sayin'.

pages.title: Attack
pages.text: In this mode, your cat will follow you and attack anything that attacks you or that you attack.

pages.title: Tactical
pages.text: In this mode, your cat will follow you but will not attack anything unless you use the command beam.

pages.title: Domestic
pages.text: In this mode, your cat will stay near its bowl, litterbox, and cat tree.

pages.title: Guard
pages.text: Cats follow closely and attack any monsters that come close.

pages.title: Skittish
pages.text: The cat will avoid all other creatures, and sometimes its owner.$(br2)You can configure how skittish your cats are in the client configuration.
